title: Hoosiers cap perfect season, win 1st national title
content: Indiana completed an undefeated season and won its first national title, beating Miami 27-21 in College Football Playoff final Monday night.

title: Fins hire Packers DC Hafley as next head coach
content: The Miami Dolphins hired Green Bay Packers defensive coordinator Jeff Hafley as their next head coach, the club announced on Monday night.

title: KU: Self to hospital out of caution, not with team
content: Kansas men's basketball coach Bill Self was hospitalized Monday out of caution and did not travel with the team to Colorado, the school announced.

title: Knicks showered with boos in 'embarrassing' loss
content: The Knicks have gone from NBA Cup champions to not even being able to rule out the play-in tournament thanks to a January freefall that saw them lose for the ninth time in 11 games with their 114-97 defeat to the Mavericks.

title: Toews gets rousing ovation in return to Chicago
content: Jonathan Toews returned to Chicago on Monday night with his hometown Jets, but it was clear that his first NHL city still counts him as one of its own.

title: Bills fire McDermott; Beane promoted to president
content: The Bills fired coach Sean McDermott and promoted Brandon Beane to president after Buffalo again failed to reach the Super Bowl despite its regular-season success.

title: King James aversion: LeBron not an ASG starter
content: For the first time in over two decades, LeBron James has not been voted an All-Star starter. A trio of former MVPs join Luka Doncic and Victor Wembanyama for the West. The East sports three first-time starters along with Giannis and Jalen Brunson.

title: Bears' Williams: Wasn't on same page with Moore
content: Bears quarterback Caleb Williams stressed the importance of being on the same page with his wide receivers after DJ Moore faced criticism for his route-running effort in overtime.

title: Way-Too-Early Top 25: Sizing up the top contenders for next season
content: Who will be raising the national championship trophy this time next year? We break down the teams to watch.

title: Scenes that set the stage: Top sights and sounds from CFP title game
content: Here are all the top scenes from South Florida as the College Football Playoff national championship got underway.

title: 'Everyone has someone to cheer for': Inside Fernando Mendoza's Miami homecoming
content: Indiana's quarterback has deep roots in South Florida, creating some split loyalties for the title game.

title: NBA All-Star rosters: Starters, snubs and biggest questions
content: The 2026 NBA All-Star starters are set. Who was the biggest surprise or snub? Which superstar duo are we most excited to see? Experts break it down.

title: NBA midseason grades: Expectations exceeded, short-lived runs and what to watch
content: Kevin Pelton gives a grade for all 30 teams halfway through the season. Which teams exceeded expectations?

title: Men's AP Top 25 poll reaction: Arizona solidifies spot, Kansas returns
content: The latest top-25 poll is out, featuring all three unbeaten teams. What's next for all 25 ranked teams?

title: The Caleb throw, a controversial call and plenty of mistakes: Barnwell sizes up 11 divisional round plays
content: Let's sort out Caleb Williams' wild fourth-quarter TD throw, the Broncos' controversial INT, a big Seattle kickoff return TD, a C.J. Stroud pick-six and more.

title: Let's overreact to divisional round games: Pause Stroud's extension talks? Concern about Stafford?
content: Hold off on any new Stroud deals? Matthew Stafford is in a funk? No Super Bowl yet again for Buffalo? Let's make sense of every divisional round game.

title: Los Angeles prevails in divisional round win over Chicago
content: The Bears had been kings of comeback wins, but the Rams are the ones advancing to the NFC title game.

title: Sizing up the AL Central: What each team still needs to do before spring training
content: There haven't been a lot of headline deals in this division so far, but there's still work left this winter.

title: Man United stun rivals City; Senegal win AFCON amid controversy; Barcelona lose; more
content: What a weekend! Man United stunned their rivals City in a fiery derby, Senegal won AFCON amid controversial scenes, Thomas Frank is on the brink as Spurs boss and Barcelona somehow lost at Real Sociedad.

title: Chaotic AFCON final an embarrassment to soccer
content: Fan clashes, VAR controversies, missed penalties, a walkout, Senegal's extra time winner - the AFCON final had it all.

title: Will Colts, Daniel Jones run it back in 2026?
content: There's mutual interest, but there's also the matter of the QB's recovery from a December torn Achilles.

title: Which injuries will have the biggest impact on the Olympic hockey tournament?
content: Leo Carlsson, Brayden Point and Seth Jones are among those ailing ahead of Milan Cortina. Plus, what to watch in the NHL this week.

title: 'Small details make the difference': How Jannik Sinner has changed his game since the US Open
content: At the 2025 US Open, Sinner was soundly beaten by Alcaraz. Since then, the two-time Australian Open champ has made adjustments.

title: Denver advances, but Bo Nix is out: Six questions about where the Broncos go from here
content: The Broncos advanced to the AFC title game but lost their QB to a broken ankle. So what's next for them on their Super Bowl quest?

title: Transfer window weekly: Güler to Arsenal? Chelsea squad changes?
content: The winter transfer window is open, so what are our reporters hearing about deals that could be done?

title: Natalia Silva, Max Holloway can create UFC chaos immediately in 2026
content: Natalia Silva, Amanda Nunes, Max Holloway and more fighters who can derail UFC championship predictions in 2026.

title: Techie’s final moments: Fire brigade reached in 45 mins, NDRF in 2 hours; kin flags system failure
content: A father's anguish echoes as his son, Yuvraj, drowned after his car plunged into a trench. Raj Mehta recounts his son's desperate calls for help, lamenting the agonizing delay in rescue efforts. He vows to fight for justice, citing institutional failure and questioning the preparedness of emergency services in this tragic incident.

title: BMC cha raja kon? BJP-Sena huddle today over high-stakes mayor post
content: The tussle for the Mumbai mayor's post continues as the state government issues a notification for the reservation lottery on January 22, with elections likely on January 31. Deputy CM Shinde assures the mayor will be from the Mahayuti alliance, emphasizing respect for public mandate and development for Mumbaikars.

title: Karnataka 'sleaze' video row: DGP Ramachandra Rao suspended after outrage; 'no one above law,' says CM
content: Karnataka DGP (Civil Rights Enforcement) K Ramachandra Rao was suspended following allegations of unverified sleaze videos circulating online. Chief Minister Siddaramaiah ordered a probe, stating no one is above the law. Rao denies the charges, calling the videos fabricated, as the government seeks reports and activists file complaints.

title: 'Will act with a force it has not yet known': Israel’s warning to Iran; what Netanyahu said on US
content: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu issued a stark warning to Iran, promising an "unprecedented" response to any attack. He stated Israel is closely watching Tehran, hinting at irreversible consequences. Meanwhile, the US is reportedly moving a carrier strike group towards the Middle East amidst rising tensions.

title: India's first ODI series loss to NZ: Too many loopholes to fix
content: India's recent series losses, particularly against an inexperienced New Zealand, have intensified scrutiny on head coach Gautam Gambhir. Despite a Champions Trophy win, the team has faltered in Test and ODI formats, raising questions ahead of the T20 World Cup. Gambhir's tenure has seen mixed results, with some strategic decisions proving beneficial.

title: Amazon accuses Saks of burning millions, warns tougher action ahead
content: Amazon is fiercely opposing Saks Global's bankruptcy financing plan, warning of severe actions.  Having invested $475 million, Amazon now deems its stake worthless due to Saks' financial mismanagement. The e-commerce giant argues the proposed financing will further jeopardize its recovery, potentially leading to drastic measures like appointing a trustee.

title: ‘Will kill you’: Gurgaon doctor reverses, accelerates, runs over Swiggy rider; caught on CCTV
content: A 41-year-old Ayurvedic doctor was arrested for attempting to murder a Swiggy delivery rider in Gurgaon. The doctor, Naveen, repeatedly rammed his SUV into the rider, Tinku, after a dispute over parking. CCTV footage captured the shocking incident, leading to Naveen's arrest and the seizure of his vehicle.

title: ‘Tough questions will be asked’: India's ODI woes under Gambhir; Rahane reveals the reasons
content: Ajinkya Rahane criticises excessive team changes and lack of clarity under Gautam Gambhir, citing India's recent ODI series losses. He stresses the need for player security and honest conversations as the team prepares for the 2027 World Cup. Rahane believes a scheduling break offers a chance for management to reset and back the right combination.

title: Nitin Nabin sole candidate in fray for BJP president’s post, all set to take over today
content: Nitin Nabin is set to become the BJP's national president, emerging as the sole candidate with widespread backing from top party leaders, including PM Modi. This marks a historic moment as the party's president has always been a consensus choice.

title: Canada's 'welcome' for EVs: Musk's Tesla, Chinese brands set to benefit
content: Canada is lifting 100% tariffs on Chinese EVs, allowing 49,000 imports annually. This move could significantly benefit Tesla, which previously shipped from China. However, a price cap on half the quota might favor Chinese brands like BYD and Nio, offering more affordable options for Canadian buyers.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens flat; BSE Sensex near 83,200
content: Stock market today: Indian equity benchmarks, Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, opened flat in trade on Tuesday on weak global cues. While Nifty50 was above 25,550, BSE Sensex was just above 83,200.

title: Russia witnesses record winter: Entire neighbourhoods buried under mountain of snow — watch
content: Kamchatka Peninsula in Russia is grappling with unprecedented snowfall, burying homes and roads under metres of snow.  Record-breaking storms have paralyzed daily life, with drifts reaching up to five metres.  Authorities have declared a state of emergency after two fatalities, and avalanche risks are high.  Transport remains severely disrupted as residents battle extraordinary winter conditions.

title: Delhi-NCR smog deepens; AQI near 400, GRAP-IV on
content: On Tuesday, Delhi NCR was enveloped in a thick smog, as the Air Quality Index surged to a concerning 379. Pandav Nagar reported an alarming 445 AQI, marking the air quality as 'severe'. Even with GRAP Stage-IV measures in place, pollution levels are still alarmingly high, revealing overlooked areas in controlling construction dust and road sweeping.

title: 'I chose it out of passion': Google founder Sergey Brin on studying computer science
content: Google co-founder Sergey Brin recently shared insights on the evolving value of higher education in the age of AI. He emphasized that passion and curiosity, rather than just credentials, drive success, even as AI capabilities grow. Brin also noted Google's shift towards hiring "self-taught stars" with proven skills over solely relying on traditional degrees.

title: ‘Easier said than done’: Virat Kohli's brother hits back at critics; star slams another ton
content: Virat Kohli's stellar 124 against New Zealand, despite India's series loss, drew praise from his brother, Vikas Kohli. This century, part of Kohli's 240 runs in the series, silenced critics like Sanjay Manjrekar who questioned his ODI commitment. Kohli's recent form, including multiple centuries, underscores his continued dominance in the format.

title: Iran unrest: Protests death toll crosses 4,000, state TV hacked - top developments
content: Iran grapples with its worst crisis in decades amidst widespread protests, a brutal crackdown, and an ongoing internet shutdown. State TV broadcasts were disrupted, showing support for an exiled prince.  Thousands are reported dead, with fears of executions rising. International pressure mounts as Iran faces a Davos snub, while US aircraft carrier movements near the Middle East heighten regional tensions.

title: Madhu Chopra says Siddharth became collateral to Priyanka’s success
content: Priyanka Chopra's mother, Madhu Chopra, revealed that her son Siddharth suffered due to Priyanka's early stardom. Madhu's extensive travel to support Priyanka's career meant Siddharth often grew up without significant parental presence. She expressed regret over this, acknowledging him as 'collateral damage' to her daughter's success.

title: Vanessa Bryant’s heartfelt birthday tribute to Natalia honors late Kobe Bryant
content: Vanessa Bryant celebrated her daughter Natalia's 23rd birthday with a heartfelt social media tribute, sharing cherished family memories. The post honored Natalia's journey, her connection to Kobe's legacy through Nike, and her burgeoning career in cinema and modeling. The touching message also included late husband Kobe and daughter Gianna, highlighting enduring family love.

title: Matthew Stafford’s family turns heads in Chicago with matching Rams style
content: Matthew Stafford and the Los Angeles Rams braved snowy Chicago for an NFC clash against the Bears. Despite an MVP-worthy season with 4,707 yards and 46 touchdowns, Stafford has never won the award. His wife Kelly and their four daughters cheered him on in matching custom Rams jackets, highlighting their family support as Stafford pursues his second Super Bowl in his 17th NFL season.

title: Bill Belichick joins ESPN as UNC looks ahead after disappointing 4–8 season
content: Bill Belichick will appear on ESPN’s ACC Network broadcast of the College Football Playoff national championship game in South Florida. The TV role comes weeks after his first season as North Carolina’s head coach ended at 4–8. Belichick is also focused on recruiting, including adding quarterback Billy Edwards Jr. ahead of the Tar Heels’ April 12 spring game.

title: Budget 2026 income tax: What middle class, salaried taxpayers & common man want
content: Budget 2026 expectations: The government had in the past considered the option of one uniform ITR form for all taxpayers, to make tax filing simpler and user friendly. It is desirable that the same be re-evaluated.

title: 'Dhurandhar' sets record for highest week 7 collections
content: 'Dhurandhar' starring Ranveer Singh and Akshaye Khanna has achieved a new box office record for seventh-week collections, surpassing 'Stree 2'. Despite a dip in daily earnings, the film's impressive net collection of Rs 826.41 crore solidifies its status as the highest-grossing single-language release, inching closer to the Rs 1,000 crore milestone.

title: Noida techie death: CEO removed as CM Yogi orders SIT probe; report due in 5 days
content: Following a software engineer's tragic drowning in a waterlogged trench, Uttar Pradesh's Chief Minister has taken serious notice. Lokesh M, CEO of Noida Authority, has been removed, and an SIT formed to investigate the incident. The victim's car plunged into the trench at a hazardous, unmarked turn in Sector 150, with rescue efforts critically delayed.

title: Bangladesh lets China envoy go close to Chicken’s Neck
content: Chinese Ambassador Yao Wen visited a Teesta project area in Bangladesh, signaling China's keenness to implement the Teesta Master Plan. This visit occurs amidst strained India-Bangladesh relations and follows discussions on development cooperation, including the Teesta project and a proposed friendship hospital.

title: NFL fans roast Josh Allen after Bills loss as Hailee Steinfeld jokes go viral
content: Josh Allen became a viral talking point after Buffalo’s playoff loss to Denver, with fans mixing football frustration and pop culture humor. Social media tied his overtime mistake to buzz around his fiancée Hailee Steinfeld, creating jokes that blended the Bills’ early exit with Hollywood references, turning postseason heartbreak into internet comedy.

title: Top stocks to buy or sell: Stock market recommendations for today - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Somil Mehta of Mirae Asset Sharekhan recommends buying NTPC, and Mphasis, while Blue Star is a sell call. Let’s take a look:

title: MLB trade rumours: Mets could add $10M Phillies star before deadline
content: The New York Mets are looking for outfield help this season. They traded Brandon Nimmo to Texas. Now, Max Kepler is a target for a one-year deal. Kepler offers defense and power. This move keeps payroll in check. It also allows younger players to develop. The Mets aim to stay competitive.

title: Mustafizur row: Pakistan halts T20 WC preparation; backs Bangladesh over India travel
content: Pakistan has halted preparations for the T20 World Cup 2026, backing Bangladesh's refusal to play in India due to security concerns. Islamabad has indicated it may withdraw if the issue isn't resolved, following Bangladesh's withdrawal from the IPL. The ICC is reluctant to shift Bangladesh's matches, potentially leading to Scotland's replacement.

title: Wanted: Fresh graduates with AI, data skills
content: Tech firms are shifting from volume hiring to skills-led recruitment, narrowing fresher intake to specialized roles. Companies are offering significantly higher packages, ranging from Rs 16 lakh to Rs 55 lakh, for niche positions in AI, data engineering, and cybersecurity, reflecting a growing demand for specialized talent.

title: 'No matter who you are': Rohit's 'real hunger' questioned after poor series
content: Rohit Sharma’s poor run continued with an 11-run dismissal in the deciding ODI against New Zealand on Sunday, raising questions about his form and motivation. Now playing only ODIs, Rohit struggled throughout the series, prompting Simon Doull to question whether the 2027 World Cup is too distant to drive him. Doull also cited limited ODI cricket as a factor. Virat Kohli topped the series with 240 runs.

title: Boost for defence exports as Rajnath flags off 1st batch of Pinaka guided rockets for Armenia
content: India has achieved a significant milestone in defense exports by flagging off the first batch of guided Pinaka rocket systems for Armenia. This move underscores India's growing prowess as a reliable supplier of advanced defense technology, transitioning from an importer to a major exporter. The Pinaka system, known for its accuracy and range, highlights the nation's burgeoning defense industry.

title: Flight duty norms: DGCA exemptions end on Feb 10, IndiGo may cut more flights
content: IndiGo may reduce flights after February 10 as a DGCA exemption for new flight-duty rules expires. The airline plans a "short-term network readjustment," potentially shifting some A320 routes to ATR aircraft to avoid major disruptions. Affected passengers will be informed and offered refunds or alternative flights.

title: List WB voters with ‘logical discrepancy’: SC to poll panel
content: The Supreme Court has ordered the Election Commission to display lists of West Bengal voters facing "logical discrepancy" notices in panchayat and block offices, granting them an additional 10 days to submit proof of credentials. The court also directed the state to provide manpower and ensure law and order for the special intensive revision drive.

title: EAM to Poland: Stop fuelling terror infra
content: India's External Affairs Minister S. Jaishankar urged Poland to adopt a zero-tolerance stance on terrorism, advising against supporting terrorist infrastructure in India's vicinity. He also voiced India's displeasure over what he termed "selective targeting" by European nations regarding the Russia-Ukraine war and trade relations with Russia, deeming it unfair and unjustified.

title: EC to showcase SIR as step to strengthen electoral process
content: India is hosting the International Conference on Democracy and Election Management in January 2026, bringing together nearly 100 delegates from 70 countries. The Election Commission will showcase its intensive electoral roll revision initiative, despite opposition concerns. The event will feature discussions on global electoral issues, best practices, and the launch of the ECINET digital platform.

title: India, UAE to elevate ties with strategic defence partnership
content: India and UAE solidified their strategic defense partnership with a new letter of intent, alongside agreements on space collaboration and LNG purchase. The visit also saw commitments to double bilateral trade to $200 billion by 2032 and explore significant infrastructure development in Gujarat.

title: SC seeks govt stand on AC rail fare cut for acid attack survivors
content: The Supreme Court has asked the government to respond to a Public Interest Litigation seeking concessional AC train fares for acid attack survivors. The NGO 'Atijeevan Society' argues that survivors, often from weaker economic backgrounds, need AC travel for frequent medical treatments but cannot afford it.

title: HC refuses to suspend Sengar jail term in custody death case
content: The Delhi High Court denied suspended jail term for expelled BJP leader Kuldeep Singh Sengar in the custodial death case of the Unnao rape survivor's father. The court cited the grave nature of the offense, Sengar's criminal history, and the trial court's findings, emphasizing that the delay in trial was partly due to Sengar's legal team's actions.

title: Watch: Regional Saffron: On BJP’s rise in Maharashtra politics
content: The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) has emerged as the dominant force in Maharashtra’s civic body elections, underlining the growing influence of Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis.

title: AI videos of Lord Jagannath surface, police complaint filed
content: One of the videos shows milk being poured over Lord Jagannath in front of the Puri temple using a crane

title: Sabarimala gold theft case: ED raids several premises in Kerala, Karnataka and Tamil Nadu
content: ED raid comes in the wake of the Enquiry Commissioner and Special Judge, Kollam, authorising the agency in early December to open an investigation against the suspects under various provisions of PMLA

title: Karnataka DGP Ramachandra Rao suspended after obscene video goes viral
content: An order issued late on Monday (January 19, 2026), stated that Mr. Rao acted in an obscene manner which is unbecoming of a government servant and also causing embarrassment to the Government

title: Gujarat turns to AI, CCTV to identify stray cattle in Ahmedabad
content: The technology will use a cow’s nose as a unique biometric identifier, similar to a human fingerprint

title: Kolkata-based solar power solutions company bags ₹64.95 crore Maharashtra State electricity project
content: As part of this program Jupiter will also launch a farmer awareness initiative through WhatsApp, SMS campaigns, and regional engagement networks to educate beneficiaries about the scheme’s benefits

title: Priyank Kharge plays good samaritan
content: Priyank Kharge on Sunday played the role of good samaritan by helping an accident victim, who was lying on the road, to reach the hospital and get immediate treatment

title: Karnataka CM vows disciplinary action against DGP, after controversial video emerges
content: Former Minister and BJP leader S. Suresh Kumar said that Mr. Rao has brought disrespect to the police, which raises suspicion on the department itself.

title: Cracks appear in Punjab Congress over calls for Dalit representation in party by Channi
content: Channi asserted he did not speak against any particular caste or community, and that he was a victim of malicious propaganda on social media

title: BJD demands Odisha Mines Minister’s removal after ED raids on his representative
content: State Steel and Mines Minister Bibhuti Bhushan Jena had designated Sunil Patra as his representative for mines department and representative’s active involvement in illegal mining came to the fore during ED’s raid, alleged the regional party

title: Odisha’s saltwater crocodile population rises to 1,858
content: As a future strategy, drones and cameras will be used in selected river segments to identify and profile individual crocodiles based on distinctive morphological features, said P. K. Jha, PCCF (Wildlife)

title: SC seeks govt response on plea for quota, concessional fare for acid attack survivors on trains
content: Due to the nature of their burn injuries, persistent itching, especially after undergoing surgery, acid attack survivors often need to travel by train in air-conditioned coaches.

title: Delhi HC quashes 2016 income tax notices to Prannoy Roy, Radhika Roy
content: Bench terms the reassessment proceedings "arbitrary" and against fundamental and constitutional rights

title: No new Guillain Barre Syndrome case in two days in M.P.’s Neemuch; six still in hospital
content: The outbreak had been reported in Neemuch’s Manasa town when child and a teenager died on January 11 and January 13 respectively. 18 people have so far reported to have been infected.

title: First guava processing plant in Rajasthan to improve farmers’ livelihood with value addition
content: The promotion of agricultural and horticultural products would help enhance the farmers’ income and strengthen the rural economy, said Om Birla

title: Haryana govt.’s changes to monthly aid scheme leave women ‘falling through the cracks’
content: The Haryana government has amended the scheme through a notification on January 8 to make the payment in two parts from the second month onwards

title: Nitish begins Samriddhi Yatra to review 430 projects announced before election
content: During his yatra, Nitish Kumar said that he will increase the financial assistance given to women, especially to Jeevika didis

title: The youth, women, poor, farmers are the foundational pillars of India: V.K. Saraswat, NITI Ayog member
content: ‘The choices you [students] make now will determine whether India’s rise is transactional or transformational’

title: SC questions Delhi government over ‘hurried’ rollout of new law regulating private school fees
content: Implementing the legislation midway through an ongoing academic session could lead to significant practical and financial difficulties for schools, the Bench says

title: Civil engineer arrested for cheating techie of ₹1.53 crore on the pretext of marriage
content: The fraud came to light when the woman visited the accused’s house and discovered that he was married and had a child

title: Diplomatic spat between India and Poland as Foreign Ministers spar over Pakistan and Russia
content: Jaishankar says Poland shouldn’t help ‘fuel’ terrorism in the region, refers to EU oil sanctions as ‘selective targeting’;  Radoslaw Sikorski describes India’s participation in Zapad exercises in Russia as ‘threatening’

title: 14 school children injured as swing collapses in Madhya Pradesh’s Jhabua
content: All the injured are being treated at the district hospital and a magisterial investigation committee has been formed, says district collector; 2 girls are seriously injured and recovering; in viral video, the swing can be seen suddenly collapsing along with the large metal frame it was hanging on

title: Private school recognition renewal process further simplified in Karnataka: Madhu Bangarappa
content: Earlier, more than 60 documents had to be submitted for the Recognition Renewal (RR) process, but the number has been reduced to 30

title: Trinamool and BJP clashover Form 7 submission
content: A delegation of West Bengal BJP met the Chief Electoral Officer and called for the deadline for submission of Form 7 to be extended by at least a week

title: Back-to-back arrests of sexual offenders in Kochi city raise safety concerns
content: While two each were nabbed by the Ernakulam North police and the Ernakulam Central police, the fifth person was arrested by the Maradu police

title: Solar energy cuts grid power consumption by about 46% in government schools, says study
content: The report was prepared in collaboration with the Indian Institute for Human Settlements. The State government’s  ‘Green Schools’ initiative has been expanded to 300 government schools across multiple phases, covering almost all districts

title: Responsibilities to be assigned to ex-Agniveers yet to be decided: CISF D-G
content: The officer said they were awaiting instructions from the Union Home Ministry on the reservation percentage for Agniveers in the CISF and also on the pattern of reservation to be followed, whether horizontal or vertical.

title: Panel launches campaign to empower women
content: Parannuyaraam Karuthode’ is a year-long Statewide campaign that aims at equipping women to navigate life’s crises with mental fortitude

title: Tamil Nadu Assembly session to begin on January 20 with Governor’s address
content: Over the past three years, issues surrounding Governor R.N. Ravi’s address and his walkouts from the House have emerged as one of the major points of contention between Raj Bhavan (now Lok Bhavan) and the State government

title: Vadhavan port is a threat to the environment and livelihood of Palghar’s people: protesters
content: The Vadhavan port needs to be stopped because it will destroy the livelihood of people in Palghar, especially fisherfolk, the Kisan Sabha said

title: Airfare surges during festivals ‘exploitative’, says Supreme Court
content: The petition said that opaque airline practices, such as sudden fare escalations, reduced flight services, inadequate grievance redressal mechanisms, and algorithm-driven pricing, infringe upon citizens’ fundamental rights

title: TMC welcomes Supreme Court’s intervention on ‘logical discrepancies’ in West Bengal SIR
content: The Supreme Court order is a slap to those trying to take away the voting rights of the people of West Bengal, says TMC general secretary Abhishek Banerjee

title: Supreme Court flags ‘stress and strain’ caused by SIR to people of West Bengal, orders transparency
content: Over 1.3 crore people have been sent notices to produce documents/file objections on ‘logical discrepancies’ found against them; petitioners call it ‘heightened profiling’

title: Himachal Cabinet gives nod to levy ‘orphan and widow cess’ on petrol, high-speed diesel
content: The move was done with the aim of generating additional resources for strengthening welfare schemes benefiting orphans and widows

title: Woman killed, 12 injured as helium gas cylinder explodes in Kallakurichi
content: The incident occurred during the River Festival, which marks the end of the five-day Pongal festivities. The injured were admitted to the Tiruvannamalai Government Medical College and Hospital

title: Sonowal’s office denies fake letter claiming rift in Assam BJP, FIR lodged
content: Issuing a categorical clarification, the Minister’s office said the purported letter — claiming demands for a leadership change in Assam and making allegations against Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma — is completely fake

title: 18 detained for bid to stage protest at Manikarnika Ghat in Varanasi
content: The protesters alleged that a statue of Rani Ahilyabai Holkar had been damaged during ongoing redevelopment work

title: Tripura lawyers set three-day deadline to sack president of consumer commission
content: The president of the West Tripura District Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission, Gautam Sarkar, is accused of misbehaving with lawyers in an inebriated condition

title: Eighth driverless train of Namma Metro’s Yellow Line reaches Hebbagodi depot in Bengaluru
content: Once testing is completed and commercial operations begin, authorities expect headways to improve to around 8–10 minutes, enhancing service frequency for commuters on the corridor

title: ED attaches two luxury Gurugram flats worth about ₹73 crore in Gensol, BluSmart group cases
content: The ED probe is based on two First Information Reports registered by the Delhi Police Economic Offences Wing

title: Supreme Court agrees to consider interim bail plea of SAD leader Bikram Singh Majithia in disproportionate assets case
content: Addressing concerns over his safety, the top court indicated that it could consider shifting Mr. Majithia to a prison in Chandigarh.

title: Election Commission to host international conference on election management, democracy
content: The ECI will hold over 40 bilateral meetings with EMBs; it will also launch ECINET, a digital platform for all election related information and services

title: SIT’s interim report shows need for exhaustive probe into Sabarimala temple administration for 20-odd years, says Kerala HC
content: The Division Bench, after examining the summary of the chemical analysis done by the VSSC, said that the apprehensions expressed by it earlier stood prima facie reinforced. SIT directed to submit a comprehensive probe status report by February 9, the day of hearing

title: Calcutta High Court takes suo motu cognisance of worsening AQI in Kolkata, issues notice to State
content: Last week, a PIL was also filed on the same matter, raising concerns about lack of action on rising air pollution in Kolkata.

title: RTC employees plan ‘Bengaluru Chalo’ protest on January 29 over pending arrears, wage revision
content: The JAC has submitted a formal representation to Transport Minister Ramalinga Reddy, outlining their demands and expressing dissatisfaction over the lack of progress in talks with the government

title: Pilgrim footfall on Sabarimala Sathram route nearly doubled over last year
content: 2,02,806 pilgrims trekked the traditional forest path to Sannidhanam this season comapred to 1,32,528 pilgrims last year

title: HMT opposes Kerala govt’s move to acquire land for Judicial City project
content: The company maintained it did not obstruct earlier orders seeking its land in the larger public interest, but argued that the Judicial City project application was qualitatively different from previous ones

title: Revanth Reddy lands in Davos to promote Telangana as global investment hub
content: During the four-day conference Mr. Revanth Reddy is scheduled to hold extensive meetings with chief executive officers of global corporations, leading investors and representatives from diverse sectors

title: Kerala’s first ‘work near home’ facility inaugurated in Kottarakara
content: Govt.’s pioneering initiative, which aims to decentralise the IT sector, can be replicated across all regions of the State, says Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan

title: State govt. will develop resting places of Rayanna's associates, says CM
content: Siddaramaiah was speaking after inaugurating Veer Bhoomi Sangolli Rayanna Museum in Nandagad of Khanapur taluk in Belagavi district

title: One Year Of Trump 2.0: Impact Of Foreign Aid Cuts On Fight Against HIV, TB
content: The Trump administration's dismantling of US foreign aid, which started a year ago on Tuesday, has caused the preventable deaths of hundreds of thousands of people and will contribute to millions more, researchers have estimated.

title: "A Man Of 'Samanvay' Who Won't Cross Lines": Meet Nitin Nabin, New BJP Boss
content: Senior Bharatiya Janata Party leader Nitin Nabin was confirmed Tuesday as the party's new National President, replacing Jagat Prakash Nadda in the high-profile post and capping an exhaustive internal selection process that began at the grassroots.

title: Israel's "Unprecedented Attack" Warning To Iran As US Ships Arms To West Asia
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has warned Iran of an "attack of unprecedented force" if Tehran were to strike Israel amid regional tensions.

title: Rajasthan Photographer Throws Acid At 14-Year-Old Girl For Refusing To Talk
content: The accused, 19-year-old Omprakash, revealed that he spotted the girl at a wedding he was covering as a photographer. Later, when Omprakash tried to contact the girl, he was rebuked, which allegedly hurt him.

title: Tamil Nadu Minister KN Nehru's Aides Took Bribes For Transfers: Probe Agency ED
content: The 99-page report, accessed by NDTV, claimed there is evidence to suggest that bribes ranging from Rs 7 lakh to Rs 1 crore were paid for the transfer of at least ten officials.

title: Polish Deputy PM Walks Away After NDTV Question On Pak's Cross-Border Terror
content: A pointed remark by External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on what he called the "selective targeting of India" set the tone for a visibly tense media interaction with visiting Polish Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Radoslaw Sikorski.

title: Karnataka Top Cop K Ramachandra Rao Suspended Over Alleged Viral Sleazy Videos
content: Multiple videos purportedly showed Karnataka Director General of Police (Civil Rights Enforcement) K Ramachandra Rao in a compromising position with women.

title: 1 Dead, 18 Injured After Helium Cylinder Explodes In Tamil Nadu
content: At least one person was killed and 18 others injured after a helium cylinder exploded during the Thenpennai River Festival in Manalurpettai in the Kallakurichi district on Monday, an official said.

title: Parts Of US Could See Northern Lights Today
content: The aurora could be visible across Canada and much of the northern tier of US states — and possibly farther south — Monday night following a major disturbance in the Earth's magnetic field, a forecast shows.

title: Action Taken Against 9 MBBS Students At Doon Medical College In Ragging Case
content: Nine MBBS students at Dehradun's Doon Medical College were on Monday suspended and expelled from the hostel for allegedly ragging junior students, officials said.

title: Missing For 10 Days, Decomposed Body Of Bhopal Man Found In Lift's Shaft
content: A 77-year-old man, Pritam Giri, was found dead in a lift shaft at the Chinar Dream City residential complex in Bhopal, approximately 10 days after he was reported missing, a police officer said on Monday.

title: Trump's Board Of Peace: Invited Leaders Still Figuring Out How It Works
content: The European Union's executive arm, Russia, Belarus and Thailand on Monday were the latest to be asked to join US President Donald Trump's new Board of Peace that will supervise the next phase of the Gaza peace plan.

title: Kerala Man Kills Self After Influencer Alleges Assault On Bus In Viral Video
content: A woman influencer travelling on the bus with the man recorded a video alleging that he misbehaved with her.

title: Case Against Woman After Kerala Man Dies By Suicide Over Her Assault Charge
content: Police here on Monday registered a case against a woman in connection with the suicide of a 42-year-old man after she allegedly posted a video on social media accusing him of sexual harassment during a bus journey, officials said.

title: NRI Woman Wins Appeal For Workplace Fairness Over Chronic Illness In UK
content: An NRI professional on Monday won her High Court appeal in London after a six-year battle for workplace fairness for women suffering from a chronic illness.

title: Atishi Denies Making Objectionable Remarks On Sikh Gurus Ever In Her Life
content: Senior Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) leader and Leader of Opposition in the Delhi Assembly, Atishi, on Monday submitted a detailed response to the Privileges Committee of the Delhi Assembly, strongly rejecting allegations of privilege breach and contempt.

title: "Committed To Fostering Economic Growth": UAE President Concludes India Trip
content: UAE President Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan on Monday concluded his three-hour visit to New Delhi during which he met Prime Minister Narendra Modi and sealed key agreements to enhance cooperation between Abu Dhabi and New Delhi.

title: US To Send Aircraft To Greenland Amid Tensions Over Trump's Takeover Bid
content: The US will deploy a North American Aerospace Defence Command (NORAD) aircraft at the Pituffik space base, Greenland, as tensions rise over President Donald Trump's move to acquire the semi-autonomous Danish territory.

title: ISIS Claims Responsibility For Kabul Attack
content: The Islamic State group has claimed responsibility for an attack on a Chinese restaurant in the Afghan capital Kabul, the SITE Intelligence Group reported on Tuesday, after a blast that killed at least seven people.

title: Mumbai-Ahmedabad Bullet Train Witnessing Steady Progress: Ashwini Vaishnaw
content: Railways Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw on Monday said that the Mumbai-Ahmedabad Bullet Train project is witnessing steady progress with the installation of Overhead Electrification (OHE) masts advancing along the corridor.

title: Nasa will send your name around the Moon! Here’s how the Artemis II sign-up works
content: The TOI Science Desk stands as an inquisitive team of journalists, ceaselessly delving into the realms of discovery to curate a captivating collection of news, features, and articles from the vast and ever-evolving world of science for the readers of The Times of India. Whether it's the intricacies of genetic engineering, the marvels of space exploration, or the latest in artificial intelligence, the TOI Science Desk ensures you stay connected to the pulse of the scientific world. At the TOI Science Desk, we are not just reporters; we are storytellers of scientific narratives. We are committed to demystifying the intricacies of science, making it accessible and engaging for readers of all backgrounds. title: Points league rankings: Young and Davis slide, Sabonis returns

title: US tightens visas: Bond of up to $15,000 for Bangladeshi visitors; norm kicks in Jan 21
content:
Bangladeshi nationals approved for a B1/B2 (business and tourist) United States visa will be required to post a bond of up to $15,000 from January 21, 2026, the US Embassy in Dhaka announced on it's social media page. This new rule will apply only to visas issued on or after that date. Nationals holding a valid B1/B2 visa issued before January 21 will not have to pay the bond.

Trump Visa Crackdown Hits India's Neighbours, US Pauses Immigration For Pakistan, Bangladesh, Nepal

In its advisory, the embassy warned applicants, “Do NOT pay your bond in advance. Paying early does not guarantee you a visa, and third-party sites can be scams.” And the agency also warned that any payment made before the visa interview “is NOT refundable.” The bond will be returned if the visa holder respects all the terms of their stay in US.

title: 'Staying outside US for too long': Immigration lawyer flags 10 Green Card mistakes one should avoid

title: Mumbai road crash: Auto rammed into Akshay Kumar’s escort vehicle; driver hospitalised
content:
MUMBAI: An auto driver was injured after a Mercedes rammed into the threewheeler at Juhu on Monday. The auto, in turn, rammed into a car that was piloting Bollywood actor Akshay Kumar’s vehicle as part of his security. Brother of the auto-rickshaw driver who got injured in the accident, Mohammed Sameer says, "This incident happened around 8 to 8.30 pm. My brother was driving the rickshaw when Akshay Kumar's Innova and a Mercedes were behind it. When the Mercedes hit the Innova, the Innova crashed into the rickshaw. As a result, my brother and another passenger were trapped under it. The entire rickshaw was destroyed, and my brother is in very serious condition. My only request is that my brother receives proper treatment and that compensation is provided for the damage to the rickshaw. We don't want anything else." Juhu police are yet to register an FIR and have got the auto driver admitted to hospital.(With Agency Inputs)

End of Article

title: NHL trade grades: Who comes out ahead on the Kiefer Sherwood swap?
content: the Calgary Flames traded defenseman Rasmus Andersson to the Vegas Golden Knights for a package that included defenseman Zach Whitecloud . Previously, the Vancouver Canucks traded Quinn Hughes to the Minnesota Wild in exchange for Zeev Buium , Marco Rossi , Liam Ohgren and a 2026 first-round pick . the Pittsburgh Penguins sent goaltender Tristan Jarry and forward Sam Poulin to the Edmonton Oilers .

title: Why clamor for Man United, Tottenham 'DNA' makes no sense
content: football DNA is a term that seems to be used only when a manager/head coach is struggling and the supporters and former players boil their difficulties down tainted . the term is called football DNA . it is the first term that has been used to describe a football team's culture .

title: Nick Foles' message to Broncos fans: Pats 'struggle against backup QBs'
content: the Broncos will face the new England Patriots in next Sunday's AFC Championship game . backup quarterback Jarrett Stidham is out for the rest of the playoffs . he hasn't started a game since the final two of the 2023 season .

title: The AFC North: 1 coach, 2 (?) starting QBs, many questions
content: new coach will have to cultivate a working relationship with lamar Jackson . owner Steve Bisciotti learned that Mike Tomlin had stepped down as the Pittsburgh Steelers ' head coach . this has become one of the most surprising offseasons in the AFC North because of the uncharacteristic turnover .

title: AL West update: Will M's spend more? Will Astros make a deal?
content: the biggest contract handed out in the American League West occurred on Nov. 17, a mere two weeks into the offseason . it wasn't from the Houston Astros, who claimed seven division titles and two world Series championships from 2017 to 2024 . the Seattle Mariners authored one of their greatest seasons in 2025 .

title: Russia pounds Kyiv with drones, missiles: Power and water supplies hit; videos go viral
content: one person is injured in the district of Kyiv, the city mayor says . a barrage of drones and missiles has been launched on the capital . the city says the power supply has been disrupted due to the strikes .

title: Follow live: Tennis Australia under pressure to fix 'worst fan experience'
content: Novak Djokovic serves up an ace to reach his 100th win at the Australian Open. (0:47) MELBOURNE, Australia -- Reigning Australian Open champion  Jannik Sinner  begins his quest for a third consecutive title Down Under on Day 3.  Naomi Osaka ,  Ben Shelton ,  Taylor Fritz , and  Madison Keys  will also feature as the final first round matches are contested. Eyes are also locked on the wait times and queues that have marred the first two days of main draw action, with fans voicing frustration about just how busy the precinct is. Some spectators were forced to wait in excess of two hours just to enter Melbourne Park on opening Sunday and Monday, then another hour to enter the show courts. Stay tuned as ESPN's team of reporters bring you all the latest news, results, match schedules, and more from Day 3 at the Australian Open.

title: Matt LaFleur's candidates to replace Packers DC Jeff Hafley could include Raheem Morris
content: the Packers wanted to re-sign Matt LeFleur . the Packers lost their defensive coordinator on monday . he will be reunited with former Packers vice president of player personnel . "we'll make sure we have a good plan in place," he says .

title: How Indiana completed the most unlikely turnaround in college football history
content: a year ago, it felt hard to believe the losingest program in FBS history would have much staying power . critics ripped their schedule, called them a fluke, debated whether they even deserved to make the college football Playoff . they should leave the real football to the real blue bloods, cue the Curt Cignetti staredown .

title: 🤔 Big questions on Bills' coaching change
content: Sean McDermott's tenure as the Buffalo Bills ' head coach ended Monday . the bills had the second-most wins (98-50) of any franchise since 2017 . general manager Brandon Beane has been promoted to president of football operations .

title: Iowa women crack top 10 for 1st time post-Clark
content: the Huskies have won 34 consecutive games dating back to last season . the first-place votes in parentheses are no. 2 south Carolina and no. 3 UCLA . each team climbed one placard despite losing to south Carolina last week .

title: Patriots hold off Texans in turnover-filled divisional round playoff game
content: the new England Patriots beat texans 28-16 in a divisional round playoff game . the Patriots' defense forced five turnovers, intercepting Texans quarterback C.J. Stroud four times . new England quarterback Drake Maye overcame three turnovers to help the no. 2 seed advance .

title: Women's AP Top 25 poll reaction: What to know about every team
content: the new AP Top 25 women's college basketball poll is out . the top six teams remain the same . just two of the Huskies' 13 remaining regular-season opponents are ranked: Notre Dame and Tennessee .
